mapper.select: select u.no, u.email, u.manager_type, u.name, u.co_name, u.co_name, to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date from user_admin u

select to_char(c.cancel_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') cancel_date, p.policy_title, a.name, a.co_name from subscription_cancel c left join order_list o ON c.order_no = o.policy_no left join subscription_policy p on o.policy_no = p.no left join user_admin a on c.user_admin_no = a."no"

select to_char(c.change_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') change_date, p.policy_title, a.name, a.co_name, to_char(c.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date, to_char(c.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end_date from subscription_change c left join subscription_policy p ON c.policy_no = p."no" left join license l on c.license_no = l."no" left join user_admin a on l.user_admin_no = a."no"

select o.no, to_char(o.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, p.policy_title, a.name, a.co_name, o.month_count, o.total_price, to_char(o.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date, to_char(o.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end_date from order_list o left join subscription_policy p on o.policy_no = p."no" left join user_admin a on o.user_no = a."no"

select o.no, to_char(o.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, p.policy_title, a.name, a.co_name, o.month_count, o.total_price, to_char(o.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date, to_char(o.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end_date from order_list o left join subscription_policy p on o.policy_no = p."no" left join user_admin a on o.user_no = a."no" where o.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update user_admin set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, co_name = #{co_name}, co_location = #{co_location}, co_tel = #{co_tel} where no = #{no}
